question:
Write a letter to the manager of a cinema (movie theatre) about a jacket you have left behind after a film.


In your letter:


Describe the jacket
Describe where you were seated
Explain what you want to be done
text: I am writing this letter regarding the lost jacket, left in your movie theater last night.

The jacket is a brown in colure, made out of cotton, large size Levies bran. To make it even easy for identification, it has two pockets inside. Fortunately, the left pocket of my  jacket’s contents three tickets numbered :- B12, B13 and B14 along with my house key with a key chain.

Me and my friends were seated on the recliner’s seats at the end of the cinema hall. I would believe it was away from the screen. My seats number would have been B12 in cinema 4 but as the theater was not crowded, I sat on B15 the center corner seat which has extra leg room.
I would appreciate if found courier it to my residential address. Alternatively, your team can contact me on this phone number: -7449769, so that I can pick it up from the ticket counter.
Please let me know if you need any other information from me.
